tracks.text: Jimmy pulls back a Raquel Welch poster, revealing a tunnel. He and Cheech crawl through, then pop out of the ground outside of the base. They look at each other, and dive back into the dirt. They leave a trail of loosened dirt as they tunnel away.
They tunnel through an urban sidewalk. In a basement, teenagers play a video game. Mobster targets appear. We zoom out, and Jimmy and Cheech pass in front of the game.
They tunnel to the next building, up the wall and over the roof, and on to the next building. Later, they tunnel across a street and into the basement of a mansion.
They climb stairs
They enter the living room.
A bat. Face punch. Head butt. Kick to the jaw. Nut kick. Spoon to a nose. Wedgie. Darkness. Cheech turns on a light. A family lies in their own blood on the floor.
A car drives east on Highway 1.
Cheech winks. A First Nation officer walks up. He sports a shoulder length braid.
In the living room, Jimmy sits in a chair cutting his toe nails. He throws the clippings across the room at a bin.
The clipping bounces off the rim.
Cookie answers the door.
Jimmy tosses a clipping at Annabelle
A police car pulls up. Petey gets out of the back.
Gina squats with balled fists.
At the Keanu Reeves Correctional Institute and Spa
Jimmy leaves the luxurious lobby, and rides a the moving sidewalk past cells with a maseuse, golf, and a reading chair.
At the Uniforms store, Gina tries on a green field girl uniform with sash and kerchief.
Jimmy and Cheech pull up to a sign saying Black Paw Reservation. The road is blocked by a barrier labelled Keep Out.
Jimmy rests against a totem pole, which falls over.
A man in blue looks up. A bear appears in the sky.
The speaker looks up. A wolf appears in the sky.
Jimmy looks up and sees a bird.
Cheech looks up and sees a platypus.
The man in blue scratches his chin. Other First Nation people stare. Jimmy stares.
The First Nation people hold rifles. Jimmy and Cheech hold handguns. They stand behind a rock and look at a moose.
The deer frowns and runs away.
Jimmy puts the gun to the moose's head.
Jimmy knife fights a beaver.
Cheech wraps wire around a bear's neck. The bear runs while Cheech holds on.
Animals sit at a round table, wearing clothes and smoking cigars. Jimmy walks up behind a rabbit and beats it with a baseball bat. He's covered in blood splatter.
A racoon gives another a massage. The masseuse backs away as the patient  puts on glasses. A bullet goes through an eye.
A wolf gets into a car and starts in. The car explodes.
At Celine Dion Elementary, Field Guide meeting today
Jimmy
Bulldozers knock down trees
An excavator digs. A drug drives by tree stumps.
In the basement, The First Nation people drop a bag on a billiards table.
O'Shea punches Jimmy
Theresa wears a tight field girl uniform. An overweight man answers the door, and looks her up and down.
Mesmerized, he hands her cash. The mesmerization wears off.
Theresa holds boxes and plumps her chest. A woman answers the door.
At the house
O'Shea escapes ropes and punches Jimmy in the nose
Gina stands in only underware
She walks away, and a dog bites at her underwear, evocative of the 1940's Coppertone Girl
Jimmy imagines flying through the air. The bird joins him.
The First Nation people look around.
Cheech drinks

In a bar, Jimmy, Cheech, O'Shea, and the First Nation people drink beer. A jewish and a muslim man stand arm and arm. A Klansman raises his hand for a high five, and a black man in a beret holds up a fist. They put their arms over their shoulders. A cat and dog embrace. An apple and orange stare at each other.
